segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes while water is pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids can be so focused on something so small.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, and it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even glance down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stop laughing at how absurd this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really tell her what’s going on, but it’s too funny to interrupt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR
